title: This infuriates me
body:
http://i.gyazo.com/2d17d6b9435140686e364c7f88dbc0dc.png

Stop limiting my ability to brag, take away so the enemy cannot see my border, and now they cannot see my mastery... real.

replies.body: Its probably a good thing, makes you have to play good to prove your border worth. Otherwise the bronzie might outshine the goldie. If the bronzie knew he/she was playing a goldie, he/she might already write this game off etc..
